ModMetaData.name: Undergrounders: Darkfire
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
This mod adds two campfires that sheds darklight, similar to the darktorch and fungus darktorch. Uses the ratios between torch lamps and darktorches to keep vanilla balance. Also adds the missing fungus-fueled brazier to the royalty expansion.
